comments: I was a little concerned in the beginning having read the reviews here and then being handed a lengthy, in depth syllabus. Professor Slusher is very kind and does her job well! Return the kindness and pursue excellence in her class. I would definitely recommend her! There is great potential to grow as a writer if you take her corrections and apply.

comments: One of the best teachers I\'ve ever had, hands down! would recommend her to any of my friends. tough grader, but is super clear on how she likes things done. always answers emails back, is super respectful if your respectful back. i would love to have her for 132 sadly she doesn\'t teach that. I LOVE MS. SLUSHER she will be a life long role model!
